text: Pseudauxa nigerrima is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Pseudauxa. It was described by Breuning in 1966.Biolib.cz - Pseudauxa nigerrima. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1966 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Pseudauxa
